channel.title: Comments on: Free SQL Server Tools
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Amit Pandit
item.dc:creator: Amit Pandit
item.content:encoded:
http://www.apexsql.com/free

3 free SQL tools for formatting, search, intelliprompt. SSMS addin

item.title: By: Al McPherson
item.dc:creator: Al McPherson
item.content:encoded:
I have helped to write miniDBA which helps with performance issues and has a free lite edition:

http://www.minidba.com/

item.title: By: Samuel Vanga
item.dc:creator: Samuel Vanga
item.description: I use poorsql.com for formatting. There is also a SSMS plug in.
item.content:encoded: I use poorsql.com for formatting. There is also a SSMS plug in.

item.title: By: Andrei
item.dc:creator: Andrei
item.content:encoded:
Well, as SSMSBoost add-in developer I would also recommend you to glance at our project. We add permanently new features and have already a big community of happy developers. You can even propose your feature, you wish to be available in SSMS: we try to take all user requests in consideration. Have a glance at the homepage and you will see if you like features of our add-in or not.

Would be glad to hear your proposals/critic.
Andrei

item.title: By: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.dc:creator: Axel Achten (axel8s)
item.description: What a coincidence, just installing all the tools I need to get started at a customers' laptop :)<br />
item.content:encoded: What a coincidence, just installing all the tools I need to get started at a customers’ laptop ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: I use SSMS Boost and like it.
item.content:encoded: I use SSMS Boost and like it.

item.title: By: John Halunen
item.dc:creator: John Halunen
item.description: Thanks Jes, somehow I never stumbled over SQL Search in spite of using various Redgate tools... And already finding it useful!<br /> John
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Jes, somehow I never stumbled over SQL Search in spite of using various Redgate tools… And already finding it useful!
John

item.title: By: Marlon Ribunal
item.dc:creator: Marlon Ribunal
item.content:encoded:
Some other tools:

SQL Map
Qure Analyzer
SQL Deploy

item.title: By: ArthurZ
item.dc:creator: ArthurZ
item.description: Alas SSMS Tools Pack does not support SQL Server 2012, and RedGate's formatter was not available for me. <br /> I also wanted to tell that http://www.atlantis-interactive.co.uk/ has a whole slew of amazing and free SQL Server tools, among them, my favorite and probably unique: Data Surf!
item.content:encoded:
Alas SSMS Tools Pack does not support SQL Server 2012, and RedGate’s formatter was not available for me.
I also wanted to tell that http://www.atlantis-interactive.co.uk/ has a whole slew of amazing and free SQL Server tools, among them, my favorite and probably unique: Data Surf!
